subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Accidents and Safety
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Deaths (Fatalities)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Cycling does not keep accident statistics, but riders and officials agree that the number and severity of race accidents have escalated significantly in recent years.
snippet: Cycling does not keep accident statistics, but riders and officials agree that the number and severity of race accidents have escalated significantly in recent years.
